rooms.description: Spacious entrance with reception area and coat closet.
Bohemian styled living room with open design, natural materials, artistic decor, and ambient lighting. Vastu aligned for energy flow.
Open dining area adjacent to the kitchen, integrated into the living space, with creative Bohemian elements.
Modern kitchen with natural stone countertops and open layout. Designed following Vastu principles for optimum functionality.
Fully functional guest bathroom with essential amenities.
Library/study area featuring shelving and comfortable seating, designed to serve as a quiet retreat.

openings.description: Balcony access to the living room and study areas, ensuring proper ventilation.

garage.description: Two-car garage located adjacent to the entrance with direct access to the apartment's common area.

rooms.description: Bohemian themed master bedroom with attached spacious balcony overlooking the garden and designed following Vastu principles for privacy.
Cozy guest bedroom with a balcony offering natural light, decorated in Bohemian style.
Additional bedroom designed with warm colors and creative decor for a relaxed environment.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, centrally located ensuring balanced flow as per Vastu.
Balconies for each bedroom providing ample outdoor space and fresh air.

rooms.description: Bohemian themed bedroom with a spacious balcony that provides an inspiring view, following Vastu guidelines for energy balance.
Additional bedroom designed with natural textures and creative Bohemian decor, ensuring ample light through its own balcony.

openings.description: Each bedroom includes a dedicated balcony for privacy and natural ventilation.
Staircase connecting the second floor to first floor, designed keeping Vastu considerations in mind.

additional_features.description: Dedicated library with ample seating and book shelving, enhancing the bohemian vibe.
